articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Researchers design “promptware” attack with Google Calendar to turn Gemini evil - Ars Technica
articles.description: The team behind the research has worked with Google to mitigate the attack, but what comes next?

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Instagram takes on Snapchat with new ‘Instagram Map’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Instagram notes that location sharing is off by default on Instagram Map, and a user's location only updates when they open the app, meaning it doesn't provide real-time location updates.
articles.content: Instagram is rolling out Instagram Map, a new feature that lets users share their most recent active location with others and discover location-based content. The Meta-owned social network is also la… [+3677 chars]
